reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic with beautiful gold buttons and appreciate its quality construction, with one noting it feels like a high-end purchase. The fabric receives positive feedback for being soft and well-presented, and customers find it comfortable and not itchy for a sweater dress, with many colors to choose from. While some customers find it true to size, others report it runs large, and opinions about the length are mixed, with some loving it while others find it too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smart and stylish
items.body: Love,love,love- the fit/material/styling. Very well made. Now I have one with long sleeves and the same dress with short sleeves. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional and cute
items.body: Beautiful and comfortable exactly what I was looking for. Thickness is perfect and fair sizing. Machine wash is ok just be careful when ironing it. Read more
items.author: Fernanda Fraide

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars The quality is really good!!
items.body: This dress is so pretty!! The quality is really good for the cost!! The fabric is soft and not plastic feeling. I want to keep it but it’s not made for my body style-sad!! I may order the next size up and try again!! Read more
items.author: B. Murray

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful dress. 5’2” 158#
items.body: Ordered this dress for a funeral. I looked at multiple different stores and couldn’t find anything appropriate. The fit was perfect! The fabric was great, I was concerned since it was a knit it would lose its shape but I wore it for at least twelve hours straight and it still looks great! Couldn’t be happier. Received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Sherrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality style cut and how gorgeous it is
items.body: This dress is probably one of the best dresses I ever bought in my entire life. It was mistaken for much higher end brand by many people. I love the look of it, the weight of it and the cut of it. This dress definitely should be a staple in every woman’s wardrobe.! I’m 5’10 and 185lbs for reference Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is an issue
items.body: The dress is good quality but I had to give it fewer stars because of the sizing. I have purchased 3 of the short sleeve versions of this same dress in small and the fit was perfect for me. I am 4'10" and 103lbs so the length was never going to be mini on me, but because I'm 70 years old, I'm ok with that. The hem on the short sleeve dresses hits perfectly at the bend of the knee. The long sleeve dress is about a size larger than the short sleeve dresses, all labeled "S". The waist is longer and the skirt is midi on me. I like the color very much and I needed a long sleeve dress for cooler days so I am keeping it but the quality control on sizing is not good. Read more
items.author: Jane S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love that dress
items.body: I own a several dress from this brand. I love it . Its so classy and comfortable Read more
items.author: daniela

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars nothing
items.body: Material is higher quality than expected fits nice, could have downsized to a med,but with holidays and all. It is a quility peiece for the price. Read more
items.author: PattI

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Dark Coffee, Watermelon, Army Green, Black, Light Yellow, Coffee, Lightgrey, Oatmeal, Taro, Light Blue, Navy, Khaki, Ivory. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
